text: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

translation.en: Say, "Allah has told the truth. So follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of the polytheists
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Benarlah (segala yang difirmankan) Allah." Maka ikutilah agama Ibrahim yang lurus, dan dia tidaklah termasuk orang musyrik
